original_text: Their Redeemer is strong; the Lord of hosts is his name: he shall throughly plead their cause, that he may give rest to the land, and disquiet the inhabitants of Babylon.
korean_text: 그들의 구원자는 강하니 그의 이름은 만군의 여호와라 반드시 그들 때문에 싸우시리니 그 땅에 평안함을 주고 바벨론 주민은 불안하게 하리라

sentences.original_text: the Lord of hosts is his name
he shall throughly plead their cause
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들의 사정을 철저히 변호하실 것이다

sentences.original_text: that he may give rest to the land
and disquiet the inhabitants of Babylon
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 바벨론 거주자들을 불안하게 하시기 위해
